website_summaries.verdict: Popular shoe with many firm followers who purchase multiple varieties.
pros: Comfortable shoe in a wide range of colors and materials including leather, velvet, textile, and faux snakeskin
cons: Some found the arch on the 3.75-inch heel was too steep

customer_reviews.title: ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! I normally wear a size 8.5 or 9, so I ordered the size 9 in these after reading reviews. The size 9 were a bit snug so I actually ended up going up to a size 9.5. I also read where someone said how the arch on the shoe didn't hit their foot right. These are great for me. I do have a high arch though. They are worth at least trying. Everyone's feet are not made the same. I've only worn these around the house so not sure if they hurt or not but as with most heels, the more you wear them the more you break them in. I'm satisfied with these!
customer_reviews.author: Vandas

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these! Got two colors, black and taupe (not sand). The taupe is a bit of a gray color. I ordered my usual 6 1/2 and they fit great. I do have a narrow foot and can see how others may have had tonsize up, but this was not an issues for me. Perfect with skinny jeans and dresses/rompers!!
customer_reviews.author: Let:it:be

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: I love these the color was perfect. I cant see how I will be able to walk in them for a long period of time. The strap across your foot hurts as your feet slide forward. May or may not return
customer_reviews.author: Krysteina

customer_reviews.title: Bridesmaid shoes, you'll regret!
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable shoe ever! All the pressure is at the ball of your feet. The little straps don't help at all. Still a sexy looking shoes, but that is it. 4 out of 6 bridesmaids found it uncomfortable. Thank gosh we ordered early and can return and find new shoes before the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Ben E.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoe and great price, but they definitely run SMALL! I usually wear a 9 1/2, so I went with the 10 but I would've been better off going up to an 11. Definitely order a whole size up.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Cute...and No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase Taupe Suede thinking that it'll be nude or flesh tone based on the picture, but it's actually more on the gray-tone. So keep that in mind. Regardless, I love them so much that I kept them anyway! I broke these in at a wedding and seriously, constant walking and dancing, NO complaints! They are incredibly comfortable - so much so, that I am ordering another pair :)
customer_reviews.author: Kim Dang

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable after just a few hours of wear. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable after just a few hours of wear. The ankle strap isn't secured in the back, so the strap moves around (I'd find the gold latch had rotated to the front of my ankle instead of staying on the side. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Celcius G.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Carrson heels: are amazing! They are definitely not for beginners since it has a 4”in. Heel but I find them comfortable. Not for a lot of walking but more pleasant than some of my more expensive shoes that are same style. They have a little cushion at ball of feet that I think helps a lot. And they look amazing on. I got mine in black and I think they are very versatile. I love that the sole is black-matte which I think helps a bit with grip. The strap that goes around ankle is a bit thin but so far it’s holding up well. I went by the Steve Madden size chart and fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nvila1988

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping the higher, blocked heel would be a comfy alternative to a stiletto. And I was wrong. (At least in this case) As soon as I put these on I knew I wouldn't last an hour in them. They are poorly engineered so that your foot seems slanted forward, putting pressure on the ball of your foot. The only plus was that they were good for wider feet. My pinky toes weren't being squeezed---more room in the toe than the skinny strapped style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ummm...not sure about these
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are cute and look as expected. Issue for me is the fit. They fit weird. Both shoes are supposed to be size 7 but the toe strap and ankle strap are different sizes on each shoe...One shoe fits fine, the other is too small. I am not sure what is going on but I have never had this issue with Steve Madden quality when buying at a store. I would have expected this quality from a cheaper, unknown label.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Payne

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: Very Beautiful shoe; however, it runs small; therefore, please size up. I did purchase my original size 6.5 and size 7. Returning the size 6.5. Here is a picture showing the size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: ... a four star is because my pain from having crappy feet might not be your problem
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving this a four star is because my pain from having crappy feet might not be your problem. I know every women's foot is different, but these were painful and looked amazing. Guess it's true, beauty is pain. Got a lot of compliments on them, but as soon as the wedding was over, these babies were off my feet and left them numb for a couple weeks :-/
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen V.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT WEDDING GOER SHOE
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE Steve Madden Fan & these prove why. Sexy, comfortable, sleek, and versatile. I have worn these for two weddings. (One formal with long dress & one beachy short dress). Both times I was able to wear them....(most of the night :) Over all these heels are a two thumbs up for me!
customer_reviews.author: TipsFromTori

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes suck. They are wildly uncomfortable and I usually love Steve Madden shoes. The toe strap is so tight and I even have narrow feet. I had my friend with wider feet and the same foot size try them on and she couldn't even get her foot into them. The heel puts all of your weight on to the front of your feet where there is zero cushioning in the shoe. If you want to wear them somewhere and sit the entire time and look pretty they'd be great. I would have returned them if I had not been out of the country and missed the window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I made the mistake of reading reviews and ordering a little big. Normally I'm 8.5 or 9 in some, so I ordered 9. Returning them now for 8.5. Super cute and though and seem like they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have them for a wedding they are very cute! Got them for any amazing price! More than a 50% discount compared to other stores. I recommend trying them on at the store. I wear an 8 but probably could use a 8.5. The color doesn't look the same online either but I knew that before buying them.
customer_reviews.author: FSUFinest12

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes! Be careful with size!!
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful. I got the lavender. I'm in love. The heel is a but higher than I normally wear but the chunky heel makes up for it. Warning in size!! I am an 8.5 in open toe and 9 in closed and based on reviews saying "runs small" I ordered a 9. I was bummed when I got them and they were too big. 8.5 is perfect! I believe they run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Cute Multipurpose Shoe
customer_reviews.text: After the reviews, I decided to size up a bit to a 9.5, so happy I did! These shoes are very cute and for the most part comfy. My poor baby toe kept running against the strap throughout the day making it a bit hard on my feet. Otherwise, I can't wait to pair these with some jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Taylordtravels

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off. Too smal. Cute heel though
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a 8 1/2 I flats and sneakers and a 9 in heels. But a lot of reviews said to go up a half of size so I did. I ordered the 9 1/2. I came in the mail and was nicely packaged and shoes are beautiful BUT still too small. My toes are at the tip top of the shoes. So I am returning them. And trying to decide wether or not to order now a Full size up to a 10. Also, the color I ordered was the taupe but it is definitely a cooler grayish taupe color
customer_reviews.author: Bjewls

customer_reviews.title: My current favorite sandals!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite shoes ever! I've got them in a nice tan color and loved them so much I had to get the black also. I've worn them to work a few times and they're amazing. I wouldn't call them the most comfortable every, but they are pretty darn comfortable if you aren't standing all day. I alternate between standing, walking and sitting while I'm at work and this works beautifully for that; the block heels really help keep them comfy, and they still look sexy because of the height.
customer_reviews.author: Tres-B

customer_reviews.title: first pair of great heels in years
customer_reviews.text: I got these in the light blue suede, and they are so beautiful. It is a very dusty blue, easy to coordinate with your outfits. Heel height is great and very easy to walk in. I wore them on a night out and was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: SNAPPED after 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes and bought them right before a bachelorette in New Orleans. I wore them with these awesome Frame denim flares and was thrilled at how well they paired! Then about 45 steps into them, standing at the beginning of a 2 hour airport security line, the strap broke. They weren't too tight, I didn't twist in away way--- they just snapped. I had to limp around like a fool and find someone in the airport stores to let me use their stapler to Fasten the strap onto the back of the shoe. Needless to say it broke again before my arrival to New Orleans. Save your money for something better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try any other brand of this generic style.
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable, painful shoes I've worn in my entire life. They are worse on the pain scale than 120 Pigalle Follies. 90 seconds in and I can't walk. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Liesel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but narrow
customer_reviews.text: My foot isn’t incredibly wide, but the minute I put the shoe on I could tell it was going to be painful to be up in them for an extended period.
customer_reviews.author: kinley

customer_reviews.title: I didn't last an hour in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute, but they rank as one of the most uncomfortable heels I have ever worn. I still have them, but I don't know why. If you're planning on wearing these often, I'd spring for a higher quality or find something with a larger block and larger front strap.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Maybe these would be better is the had a standard sole and an option ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a let down. Cute, but the sole is so narrow that my daughters feet were hanging over and both her pinky toe and large toe were barely able to fit into the toe straps. Cheap ankle strap as well. Maybe these would be better if they had a standard sole and an option for wide in all sizes
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were cute, but I was sent the floor model & it was missing the strap so I had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sepe

customer_reviews.title: You'll like how they fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stylish and they go with everything. I bought them in this color and black and have actually bought them twice because I liked them so much
customer_reviews.author: randi b.

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these shoes going to order in black! So comfy fit perfect so cute good quality! I wore these on my wedding day they were everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Winter Gail Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Painful, but gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is gorgeous...but, only if you plan not to walk in them. They are killers. The arch is painful and very hard to walk in. They run very small. I sized up one whole size. I had to return these even though they look beautiful on.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelylady

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I've concluded that this style and brand of shoe are one of me and my daughters favorite. We own six pair!!! They look great on and are very comfortable. They can be worn with anything too!
customer_reviews.author: MnMMom3

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these so badly for such a long time. Finally caved and bought them and I was so excited for them to come in. I ordered a size 7, which fit but it was just slightly too small. I could've made them work and I loved the style, but oh my goodness they are uncomfortable. I don't think these heels could've ever been broken in. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: So unbelievably uncomfortable... I wore these to ...
customer_reviews.text: So unbelievably uncomfortable... I wore these to my brothers wedding and only lasted through the ceremony before I had huge busters on my big toe and balls of my feet. I normally don’t complain and a total shoe girl but I had to say something. Careful with these as the have no cushion and will rub your feet raw
customer_reviews.author: chelsea n

customer_reviews.title: Size is spot on
customer_reviews.text: Most reviews said this shoe ran small. I am almost always a 9.5. I read many reviews saying this shoe was tight and short. I ordered a 10 and it was way to big. I do have a very high arch, but usually doesn't make a difference in length or width. Order the size you usually are. It's a beautiful shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AGB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & True to size!
customer_reviews.text: I stand by Steve Madden shoes, especially these chunky heels. I have these in 4 different colors. Seriously the comfiest block heels I've ever owned, AND they're super high!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sandelis

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and pretty! I did add a mini strap pad that ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and pretty! I did add a mini strap pad that I purchased for the ankle strap, but the fit is excellent and the height was very comfortable for long hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa A.

customer_reviews.title: different color
customer_reviews.text: i love Steve madden shoes and even though this shoe was a different color compared to the displayed color i still kept the shoes..its more grey color.
customer_reviews.author: LIL

customer_reviews.title: My Heel Broke Before The Night Even Began
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought this product 3 months ago, I wore it for the first time tonight to a comedy show. I can honestly say that I walked less than half a block towards the venue before the right heel broke completely off. When I inspected it more closely, the shoe had been GLUED together. Very humiliating experience to have to spend my evening with one heel.
customer_reviews.author: deasmen c.

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it’s cute but I read reviews and got recommendations to buy this but it was killing my feet after 2 hours and I didn’t do a lot of walking! I was walking around like a baby giraffe learning to walk! Maybe people with flat feet can wear this but definitely didn’t work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Find another shoe...
customer_reviews.text: First off, these smell very strange. Like plastic and moth balls. Secondly, they're very cheaply made and over priced for what you get. If I didn't have to wear them as an emergency shoe for an event I would have sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Very high
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but the heel was too high, not very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: cherie w.

customer_reviews.title: Hurt
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these shoes hurt! I have narrow feet but I can't imagine this working out for someone with wide or medium feet. Those people who said they were comfortable must have no feelings left in their feet! Returning them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these heels and the price.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great on! The heel is comfortable enough to wear all day long. They are a little snug in the toe strap area but nothing uncomfortable. I also think they will stretch over time since they are suede. These are also $20 less than they are anywhere else online.
customer_reviews.author: xsenior

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the shoe; however I would recommend sizing up as I am a pretty true to size 6.5 and these feel tight
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is a fashionable Great brand. Well made and ment to last. Not returning it, however it's fit is a bit smaller than comfortable. My daughter usually wears a size 7 but ordered 1/2 size larger to accommodate the style. Still about a half size too small. I know for future orders, order a full size larger.
customer_reviews.author: R.CALIUP

customer_reviews.title: Great product! The only thing is that when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The only thing is that when I got the shoes the soles where a little dirty like if someone else had tryed them before so I didn't get the impression of new shoes but I'm really happy whit the fit and they look really good
customer_reviews.author: Verónica Escobar

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with one shoe missing the strap. Otherwise, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvana Holguin

customer_reviews.title: I love shoes that are 4 inch and under
customer_reviews.text: I love shoes that are 4 inch and under. With age, I had to give up my 5 inch heels but these are super comfy and stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: PLove

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE HEELS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE HEELS. They are so cute and actually fairly comfortable. I want to get them in nude as well. I am a size 5 and they fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Totally uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Totally uncomfortable for a black suede heel. I wore them twice and had to toss them. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Indira

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m obsessed with these shoes! I ordered these so I could wear them for my bridal shower. They fit perfectly, definitely true to size. I will be ordering more pairs in different colors for sure! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: E_FamilyOC

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a wedding- feet will hurt tho
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for a wedding, looks great on! although did have to take them off during reception due to my feet hurting. All in all, appearance wise- great shoe for a wedding or event
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super cute pattern and that’s the only reason I’m giving these shoes 2 stars. The low rating is due to the fact the first time I wore these the clasp broke. I basically was only able to wear these for an hour before they broke. Even more upsetting I was at a formal event and had to use string to keep the clasp together so I wouldn’t have to go barefoot for the rest of the night. So disappointing especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roxi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple cocktail shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a wedding and am excited to try. I had been searching for this style and finally found it. I was concerned about my heel popping out of the backing and strap not feeling supportive enough but that wasn't an issue at all. They are pretty tall with a four inch heel, but comfortable for such a height. I received lots of compliments on these!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these shoes. Just had to have ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. Just had to have them for soroity rush. Went to several stores trying to find them before ordering from Amazon. She normally wears a size 6 but in these definitely had to have a 6&1/2.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garner

customer_reviews.title: Strap Broke
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these shoes - wore them a lot until the stap around the ankle broke. Sad day.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fannin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too tall
customer_reviews.text: Cute but too tall for me so I had to return
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: True to size. I love these so much I ordered them in black right away. Super cute. Definitly not a product that focuses on comfort but they will go with everything for summer party's and events.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rapp

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super cute and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute and they fit perfectly. I absolutely luv them. I wear them often and the only issue I have is the buckle on the left shoe sometimes rubs again my ankle bone and causes some discomfort. But once I move the strap around, it's all good. These shoes are worth every penny I spent on them.
customer_reviews.author: DHop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are gorgeous, comfortable, and completely true to size and color. They look exactly as pictured, and the quality is top-notch. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Prime&Proper

customer_reviews.title: I Love these Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Every beautiful shoes. They are exact fit, had to have them stretch. Should have brought 1/2 bigger, I still wore them and love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! They are super sexy and pretty comfy. I got through about 5 hours of a wedding/dancing until I had to take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cute but surprisingly not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but gave me blisters every time I wore them ! You would think these would be super comfortable but their not, they are comfortable for 3hrs tops after that I keep getting blisters
customer_reviews.author: shayne lewis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These definitely aren't the most comfortable shoes ever as there is no arch support, but the chunky heel makes them feel very sturdy. I've received so many compliments on these shoes, and they go with so many different outfits.
customer_reviews.author: BMisey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sandal for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the brand, I range in either a 6.5 and 7. I went with the 7 and it fit perfectly. The shoe is very comfortable and unless you are not use to walking in high heels you will be fine. The pink was true to color or at least to the color I needed.
customer_reviews.author: JEA15

customer_reviews.title: Stay true to size
customer_reviews.text: I love them and the color is exactly as shown. I stayed true to my size.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are so comfortable but still very stylish. I usually would not spend as much money on shoes but I have a special event coming up, glad I splurged! Very sturdy and I can tell they're going to hold up for a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke After One Wear
customer_reviews.text: They broke on me after one normal wear walking around the office! The entire bottom plastic part of one of the heels fell right off. I have these in many other colors with no problems but these ones were horrible. I want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Steve Madden classic.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful suede shoes! But they take a while to brake in. Order your true size and stretch them out. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P

customer_reviews.title: Beauty does't have to be painful
customer_reviews.text: cute but no give, hurt my pinky toe, yes, I said pinky toe but only the left and while sitting which was strange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dance the night away in these!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! You have to get used to the skinny strap, but they are super sturdy thanks to the block heel. I always get so many compliments when I wear them. I wore these to a wedding and danced the night away. They started getting uncomfortable a few hours in, but what heels don't?!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Red is not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The red is not as pictured and is instead more of a burnt red/orange. Not even comparable and a new picture should be added asap from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lay S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute and the color that I got will match with just about everything. The heel is slightly taller than I thought it would be, but still surprisingly comfortable. I just wore them out for a night on the town in Chicago and my feet were not killing me when I took them off when I got home. My knees hurt a little bit, but not my feet. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Meriwether

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wore these toa wedding and a interview.. very stylish and classy
customer_reviews.author: Tesia

customer_reviews.title: Not a new item
customer_reviews.text: The item was used, without a box (it was good used condition—but still obviously used). There were scratches on the heel and strap and the sole “lines” were faded (from normal wear). I am not happy that I bought this anticipating a new item (since I paid for new).
customer_reviews.author: Steph J

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: strap across the toes too tight.... can be stretched out but didn't want to mess with it....
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Dry rotten- Poor quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came with parts of it easing off. Cannot be worn without sending it to a shoe maker...I need my money back. Poor quality shoe
customer_reviews.author: Emprez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are so cute and as comfortable as a heel can get.
customer_reviews.author: vigomez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these shoes. I couldn't keep them though BECAUSE, "I had to choose between them and another pair!!!" 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure someone who wear heels often would be fine with the height but I don't wear heels often ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these they were way too high and uncomfortable for me... I'm sure someone who wear heels often would be fine with the height but I don't wear heels often and when I do its not a very high heel. I wanted to love them but couldn't do it
customer_reviews.author: Calitag

customer_reviews.title: Great for special occasions
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend’s wedding, received a lot of compliments! I wore them allll night, and I’m a big dancer. I was dropping it low and jumping in these just fine. My feet did hurt by the end of the night but I didn’t get any blisters which I was worried about. The design does put a lot of weight on the balls of your feet which isn’t the best. So these wouldn’t be a shoe I could wear comfortably everyday.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I’m beyond impressed!!! These shoes are so cute and came in such great condition!! They where brand new never been worn whatsoever!! So stoked & a very satisfied customer!!! Thank you thank you thank you!!! Will buy from this person again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but run small
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Except they are SUPER tight and run a lot smaller than normal. I am always a 10 in Steve Madden and I should have ordered at 10.5. Just a heads up for Those who want to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Reardon

customer_reviews.title: Not very flexible
customer_reviews.text: Not very flexible can be hard on feet and toes could have more sole cushioning
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: Yes I am! I'm not gonna lie, they are a lil bit stiff and hurt in some areas, but hey there are any heels 100% comfortable??? Lol. they are SO SO SO gorgeous , 5 stars to me!
customer_reviews.author: Jammie M.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and Pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes!! The color is gorgeous and I found them to be just fine as far as comfort goes. I bought them in size 8 I usually fall between a 7.5 and 8 so ordering the larger size was a smart move! I read some of the reviews before ordering, and found that some people were disappointed with the toe strap. I had no issues at all. They are just the perfect "snug" fit that allows your toes to stay in place WITHOUT pain! At the same time NOT allowing your toes to "slide" over the edge of the shoe! I definitely recommend this sandal!!
customer_reviews.author: lisala

customer_reviews.title: Look great but VERY Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore as a bridesmaid and my feet are still throbbing 24 hours after the wedding. Looked great and held up through lots of running around in grass, gravel, concrete, stairs and patios. Well made just not comfy
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: CUTE BUT RUNS SMALL
customer_reviews.text: They are really cute but they run too small. I’m a size 9 and I sized up to a 10 after reading reviews and they were still too small and tight around the ankle and on the toes. I have an average foot so the fitting of the heel made my feet feel big and squished.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Echeverria

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe on the feet
customer_reviews.text: The heel was a little high but I will make the adjustments. Great looking shoe on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: P Watch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even cuter in person! They have a light cushion in the soles and ball of the foot. The material is soft and super easy to wipe down. I stepped off in a mud puddle and they cleaned ridiculously easy. They are quite comfortable, considering the heel height. I highly recommend. They are well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: IGNORE THIS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Summer!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I am contemplating getting them in the light blue color as well. Beautiful yellow shoes for spring and summer. Four stars because they do not offer the much support and are not the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite heels!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite heels by Steve Madden. I have them in the blush color, black and taupe. They fit true to size (I'm usually a 7 in Steve Madden, sometimes I can get away with a 6.5). Super comfortable even after wearing them for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth the pain...
customer_reviews.text: My feet HURT. Hard to walk in. I wear heels like everyday to work so its not my ability to handle high heeled shoes. This is my second pair of unbearably uncomfortable shoes from Steve Madden. Bummer. Very stylish, but I won't be shopping this brand anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren N G

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think these are genuine. Did they are Steve Madden needs to do a better job.
customer_reviews.text: Have some doubt that these are real. Did not come in original box, no brand or size marking on soles and leather uppers did not appear genuine. Also too small. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Buy these! So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. I wore these to a work dinner , most of the nights I was standing and mingling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOo Cute, but painful
customer_reviews.text: Love the look for these shoes. Perfect tan color. Very cute, BUT very painful on the ball of my foot under my big toe. I even added a pad underneath and still after a couple hours, it was painful.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Heel is VERY high
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! The fun pattern is very unique and goes with a lot of things, but the heel is so high I had to have it cut down. Once I did that they were wearable but beware if you're not used to wearing stilts.
customer_reviews.author: Marci P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Heels
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect black heel for daytime outfits. Could be used casually for evening outfits. This classic beautiful heel is also very comfortable with a thin ankle strap that makes them sexy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Poggio

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Fit perfect, came quickly and really cute
customer_reviews.author: AEE

customer_reviews.title: I love the Carrson
customer_reviews.text: I love the Carrson! This is my second color in this shoe and there might be more in the future. Taupe is super pretty almost like a light grayish color. Love it! Pretty and neutral!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Luchini

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Carrson Dress Sandal
product_meta.description:
Single band ankle strap sandal

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
feature_bullets: Ankle-strap sandal in rich leather featuring covered block heel and single toe strap
